Package jwrc.game

Class Trade

java.lang.Object
jwrc.game.Trade
public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
implements the in-game Trading, Auction etc functionalities

  • Constructor Details

    • Trade

      public Trade()

  • Method Details

    • startAuction

      public static void startAuction​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> parts, Property property)
      begin an auction to find who will own a property
      Parameters:
      parts - the ArrayList of Player's who will be bidding in the auction (taken to be in correct order)
      property - the Property object which is up for bidding

    • tradeGOOJFCard

      public static void tradeGOOJFCard​(Player seller, Player buyer, int amount, boolean isBuyer)
      Represents trade interaction where buyer attempts to buy from seller by amount specified This boolean allows us to use the same function for multiple cases i.e. when a player is lookign to sell their card or when a player is looking to buy from another player
      Parameters:
      seller - player object that is selling the card
      buyer - player object that is buying the card
      amount - price offered by buyer to seller. Assumed that buyer has sufficient money
      isBuyer - true if the current player is looking to buy the property, false if selling

    • sellProperty

      public static void sellProperty​(Property p, Player seller, Player buyer, int price)
      Represents trade offer for a property between two players. Note: can only be called by the seller as per the rules of this game
      Parameters:
      p - property object to be sold
      seller - player object looking to sell the property
      buyer - player object potentially buying the property
      price - amount of money at which seller has offered to sell at

    • safeTrade

      public static void safeTrade​(Player seller, Player buyer, Property p)
      Called to change the owner of the property and adjust relevant metrics of each property e.g. if buyer's number of transports has increased, then the rent of all transports should be increased
      Parameters:
      seller - player object selling the property
      buyer - player object buying the property
      p - the property object to be sold
